TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MouseEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs

summary.span: 提供滑鼠相關路由事件的資料，這些事件並不特別涉及滑鼠按鈕或滑鼠滾輪，例如 。

span.span: Provides data for mouse related routed events that do not specifically involve mouse buttons or the mouse wheel, for example .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件資料類別會搭配下列附加事件。This event data class is used with the following attached events. - - - - - - 此事件資料類別會搭配下列路由事件。This event data class is used with the following routed events. 這些路由的事件轉送，使其更容易存取一般項目模型中先前所列的附加的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - - - - - 附加的事件和基底的項目路由事件共用其事件資料，而反昇和通道之路由事件的版本也共用事件資料。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 事件路由傳送，這可能會影響事件的處理的特性。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 除了與相關的所有路由事件，最有趣的內容屬性中，您可能會使用實作數個屬性公開目前按鈕狀態 （例如)和)。Other than the properties that are relevant for all routed events, the most interesting properties of that you might use in a implementation are several properties that expose the current button state (such as ) and ). 很有用，尤其是因為您可以檢查在其上。 is useful particularly because you can check on it. 請注意，專門處理滑鼠按鈕事件的事件會使用不同的事件資料類別， 。Note that events that specifically deal with mouse button events use a different event data class, . 滑鼠按鈕內容位於以防有輸入的模式] 或 [涉及按鈕，即使您正在處理非按鈕事件的互動。The mouse button properties are available on in case there are input modes or interactions that involve the buttons even if you are handling a non-button event. 類別會提供額外的屬性和方法來判斷滑鼠的狀態。The class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Point GetPosition (System.Windows.IInputElement relativeTo);
.method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Point GetPosition(class System.Windows.IInputElement relativeTo) cil managed
Public Function GetPosition (relativeTo As IInputElement) As Point
public: System::Windows::Point GetPosition(System::Windows::IInputElement ^ relativeTo);

param.name: relativeTo
param.span: 作為參考框架，以計算滑鼠指標位置的項目。

span.span: The element to use as the frame of reference for calculating the position of the mouse pointer.

summary.span: 傳回滑鼠指標相對於指定之項目的位置。

span.span: Returns the position of the mouse pointer relative to the specified element.

returns.span: 滑鼠指標相對於指定物件之位置的 x 和 y 座標。

span.span: The x- and y-coordinates of the mouse pointer position relative to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 點 (0，0) 是參考框架的左上角。The point (0,0) is the upper-left corner of the frame of reference. 靜態方法也可用來取得的滑鼠位置。The static method can also be used to obtain the position of the mouse.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InvokeEventHandler (Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InvokeEventHandler(class System.Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub InvokeEventHandler (genericHandler As Delegate, genericTarget As Object)
protected: override void InvokeEventHandler(Delegate ^ genericHandler, System::Object ^ genericTarget);

param.name: genericHandler
param.span: 以特定型別的方式呼叫的泛型處理常式。

span.span: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.

param.name: genericTarget
param.span: 對其呼叫處理常式的目標。

span.span: The target to call the handler on.

summary.span: 以型別專屬的方式叫用事件處理常式，這樣做能夠提升事件系統的效率。

span.span: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會轉換為一般處理常式時為然後再叫用。This implementation casts the generic handler as a and then invokes it. 如需這項實作模式及它的理由的詳細資訊，請參閱和[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
